attributes.action: Repair public trust in MP's by dissolving Parliament and calling an immediate General Election
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the wake of the expenses scandal and the public's loss of trust in all British politics. Parliament should be dissolved immediately so that voters may be given the chance to express their views at the ballot box.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
